column4: Hi guys could someone guide me a link to setup a vpn on a VDS/VPS - having a hard time finding one that doesnt connect back to my home, need to kind of route webtraffic through the US (as I am in Canada for a few weeks) VDS/VPS that I have running?
well lots of reasons - one being Hulu (us resident not in US atm), and to learn how to do it
ive been messing around w/ openVPS and pptpd and dont really understand the man pages very well - not sure its what i need
You should have setup your home computer as a proxy before you left :)
